rules.title: SELECT *
rules.message: Never use SELECT * - breaks on schema changes, wastes bandwidth. Always specify explicit column lists.

rules.title: LIKE with Leading Wildcard
rules.message: Never use LIKE with a leading wildcard ('%...') - it forces a full table scan and cannot use indexes. Use full text search instead.

rules.title: Functions on Columns in WHERE
rules.message: Never apply functions to indexed columns in WHERE clauses. This prevents index usage and forces full table scans.

rules.title: Large OFFSET Values
rules.message: Never use large OFFSET values for pagination. OFFSET scans and discards rows, getting slower as offset grows. Use cursor/keyset pagination.

rules.title: Supabase .select() Without Columns
rules.message: Supabase .select() calls should specify columns explicitly. Empty .select() returns all columns like SELECT *.
